Hooks
eeOS

Allow the user to insert software hooks. More...

Collaboration diagram for Hooks:

Defines

#define HOOK_OS_IDLE()
 This hook is called when no task is running and the application runs in the IDLE loop.
#define HOOK_OS_STACK_OVERFLOW()
 This hook is called when a stack overflow error is detected.
#define HOOK_OS_TICK()
 This hook is called during each tick interrupt.

Detailed Description

Allow the user to insert software hooks.

All the hooks are expected to be macros and should follow the following assignement: 

 #define HOOK_OS_EXAMPLE() my_hook()
